title: User wants to see Player's name in Request Entry section stand out more
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged in and viewing waivers screen in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a player from the 'Player' dropdown in request entry section
custom_expected:
THEN the label "Player" should be removed from the request entry box
AND placeholder text "Select a Player" should be added to the searchable select and vertically centered
AND Once the Player has been selected their name should appear in blue text, font-size: 16px, font-weight:600
AND the Player's name should link to the Player profile

title: User wants to receive error when submitting a player that has been signed as Free Agent
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC or club user is logged in and viewing Waivers Screen in edit mode
AND user has selected a Request Date that that is prior to June 16
AND user has selected a player that has been signed as a Free Agent under Article XXB in the prior offseason
AND user has selected Outright Waivers
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Save or Submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error message “Invalid Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] is a recently signed XXB Free Agent.  The waiver cannot be requested for the selected player until [June 16, Current Year].”
AND clicking "Back" should return the user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the request (BOC Only)

title: User wants to receive error if OR waivers are selected and player already secured OR waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC or club user is logged in and attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND user has selected a player that has already secured outright waivers
AND "Outright Waivers Good Until" date on the Player's Profile is later than the Secure Date on the new Request (2 waiver business days after request date)
AND user has selected "OR" waivers
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Save or Submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN system should display blocker message “Ineligible Waiver Request. You have already secured Outright Waivers for [Last Name], [First Name]. Secured waivers will be effective until [Waiver Expiration Date].”
AND clicking "Back" should return the user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the request (BOC Only)

title: User wants to receive error if TRD waivers are selected and player already secured TRD waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC or club user is logged in and attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND user has selected a player that has already secured trade waivers
AND "Trade Waivers Good Until" date on the Player's Profile is later than the Secure Date on the new Request (2 waiver business days after request date)
AND user has selected "TRD" waivers
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Save or Submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN system should display blocker message “Invalid Waiver Request. You have already secured Trade Assignment Waivers for [Last Name], [First Name]. Secured waivers will be effective until [Waiver Expiration Date].”
AND clicking "Back" should return the user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the request (BOC Only)

title: User wants to receive error if OPT waivers are selected and player already secured OPT waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC or club user is logged in and attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND user has selected a player that has already secured optional assignment waivers
AND "Optional Waivers Good Until" date on the Player's Profile is later than the Secure Date on the new Request (2 waiver business days after request date)
AND user has selected "OPT" waivers
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Save or Submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN system should display blocker message “Invalid Waiver Request. You have already secured Optional Assignment Waivers for [Last Name], [First Name]. Secured waivers will be effective until [Waiver Expiration Date].”
AND clicking "Back" should return the user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the request (BOC Only)

title: User does not want to see seconds in time field for UR Waiver Requests
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC user
AND user has navigated to Waivers Screen
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a player and chooses "UR" type waivers
custom_expected:
THEN seconds should not be available in the "As Per Release AT" field timepicker
AND seconds should not display in this field in view or edit mode

title: User wants sending Waiver Results Bulletin to properly set results for players who have secured waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Waivers have been requested for a player
BUT these requested waivers do not yet have a result
AND these requested waivers have NOT been claimed or cancelled
custom_steps: WHEN Waiver Result Bulletin is sent
custom_expected:
THEN results should be set according to the following criteria:
For UR waivers,result text should be set to "Secured for the purposes of UR".
For TRADE waivers for non-optioned players, result text should be set to  "Secured Through Conclusion of Championship Season"
For all other waivers, result text should be set to "Secured until {Waiver Claim Expiration Date}"

title: User wants sending Waiver Results Bulletin to properly set results for players who have secured waivers - Claim Expiration Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Waivers have been requested for a player
AND Waiver Request type is NOT UR, or Trade waivers for non-optioned player
BUT these requested waivers do not yet have a result
AND these requested waivers have NOT been claimed or cancelled
custom_steps: WHEN Waiver Result Bulletin is sent
custom_expected:
THEN result text should be set to "Secured until {Waiver Claim Expiration Date}"
AND waiver expiration should default to 5PM on Waiver Period End date 
BUT if player is optioned, system should update waiver expiration date to 1pm on the 3rd calendar day after claim expiration date, unless that falls after the end of the waiver period
AND for outright waivers where the claim expiration date was in the 1st, 2nd, or 5th outright waiver period, system should update waiver expiration date to 1pm on the 7th calendar day after the claim expiration date, unless that falls after the end of the waiver period
BUT for outright waivers with a claim expiration date in the 4th outright waiver period, if the player is not Optioned, set the time in the result message to Midnight instead of whatever time was determined above
AND Waiver Period End Date should be determined by Waiver Type (see business rules)

title: User wants to see Transaction Bulletin for requested UR waivers that were Claimed and not Cancelled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN UR waivers have been requested for a player
AND these UR waivers have an eligible Org
AND these UR waivers were not cancelled
custom_steps: WHEN the Waiver Result Bulletin is created (the first time ONLY)
custom_expected:
THEN a transaction bulletin should entry should be created for any of these UR waivers
AND description should read - “Player has been claimed on unconditional release waivers by [Eligible Org] and has 5 days to accept or reject assignment.”

title: User wants Waiver Request Result set properly for Waiver Requests that were cancelled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Waiver Request has been submitted for a player
AND one or more Orgs have submitted claims on this request
custom_steps: WHEN the Request is Cancelled
custom_expected:
THEN Claim Result should be set to “Cancelled on [cancellation date]”
AND Awarded Flag should be set to 0 for each claim on the request

title: User wants approving UR transaction to terminate player's MJ Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN an Unconditional Release transaction has been approved for a player as the result of a UR Waiver Request
custom_steps: WHEN the Unconditional Release Transaction is approved
custom_expected:
THEN status of player's latest Approved or Update Approved MJ Contract should be updated to Terminated
AND  "Terminated on [current date (mm/dd/yyyy)] As Per Unconditional Release” should be appended to comments

title: User wants approving UR transaction to terminate player's MN Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN an Unconditional Release transaction has been approved for a player as the result of a UR Waiver Request
custom_steps: WHEN the Unconditional Release Transaction is approved
custom_expected:
THEN status of player's latest Approved or Update Approved MN Contract should be updated to Terminated
AND "Terminated on [current date (mm/dd/yyyy)] As Per Unconditional Release” should be appended to termination comments

title: Club user wants to view Waiver Claim Results
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club user is logged in and viewing Waivers Screen
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a Request Date for which Results Bulletin has been sent
custom_expected:
THEN if the Org had at least one submitted request a table should display containing ONLY the players that the Org requested waivers on, and include the Results as displayed on the Waiver Results Bulletin
BUT if the Org did not have at least one submitted request,  the text "No Waivers Requested" should display
AND 'Players Claimed' subsection should be displayed
AND If the Org had at least one player that they entered a claim on - whether or not they were determined to be the "Eligible" Org, the Players Claimed table should display per the wireframe and include only the players that the viewing Org submitted a claim for
BUT if the Org was deemed to be the Eligible Org, then the "Results" should say "Eligible"
AND if the Org was not deemed to be the Eligible Org, then the "Results" should say "Not Eligible"
AND  if the Org did not have at least one player that they claimed, then the text "No Players Claimed" should display

title: BOC user wants to view Waiver Claim Results - Before Sending Results Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in and viewing Waivers screen  
AND a Request Bulletin has been generated for a specific Request Date
AND Results Bulletin HAS NOT been sent for that Request Date
AND the "Results" section displays only Cancellation or Claim information for that date
custom_steps: WHEN user sets the "Org" filter in the header to anything other than "All"
custom_expected: THEN Results section should only display the waivers requested by the selected Org

title: BOC user wants to view Waiver Claim Results - After Sending Results Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in and viewing Waivers screen
AND a Request Bulletin has been generated for a specific Request Date
AND Results Bulletin HAS been sent for that Request Date
custom_steps: WHEN user sets the "Org" filter in the header to anything other than "All"
custom_expected:
THEN the Results section displayed should match what the Club user sees
AND 'Player Results' subsection should be displayed
AND If the Org had at least one submitted request, then a table should display containing ONLY the players that the Org requested waivers on, and should include the Results as displayed on the Waiver Results Bulletin
BUT if the Org did not have at least one submitted request, then the text "No Waivers Requested" displays
AND 'Players Claimed' subsection should be displayed
AND if the Org had at least one player that they entered a claim on - whether or not they were determined to be the "Eligible" Org, then the the Players Claimed table should display per the wireframe and include only the players that the viewing Org submitted a claim for
BUT if the Org was deemed to be the Eligible Org, then the "Results" should say "Eligible"
AND if the Org was not deemed to be the Eligible Org, then the "Results" should say "Not Eligible"
AND if the Org did not have at least one player that they claimed, then the text "No Players Claimed" should display

title: User wants to see  Player Notif. button for player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is logged in
AND club has requested UR waivers for one or more players
AND these Waivers have not been cancelled
custom_steps: WHEN club user navigates to Waivers Screen and selects the request date for these waivers
custom_expected: THEN user should see "Player Notif." button in "Player Results" table for these players

title: Club User wants to see Accept and Reject buttons for player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is logged in
AND the club has requested UR waivers for one or more players
AND the UR waivers have been claimed
BUT the UR waivers have NOT been cancelled 
AND a Waiver Claim Assignment has not been created for these waivers
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the relevant request date on Waivers screen
custom_expected:
THEN user should see split button with Player Accept and Player Reject in the "Player Results" table for these players
AND these options should be available in addition to the "Player Notif." option

title: Club user wants to see a Create Waiver Claim Assignment button for player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is logged in 
AND club has requested REVOCABLE waivers for one or more players
AND the waivers have been claimed
BUT the waivers have not been cancelled
AND current time is before 1:30 PM on Withdrawal Expiration Date
custom_steps: WHEN user selects the relevant Request Date on Waivers screen
custom_expected:
THEN user should see a Create Waiver Claim button in the "Player Results" table for these players
BUT this button should not appear after 1:30 PM on Withdrawal Expiration Date

title: User wants to be able to open player profile from Waivers screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC user
AND user has navigated to Waivers screen
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a request date for which players are populated in Request Entry, Players w/Requested Waivers, and Results sections
custom_expected:
THEN Player Names should be hyperlinks under Request Entry and open the player profile in the same window when clicked
AND Player Names should be hyperlinks under Players w/Requested Waivers and open the player profile in the same window when clicked
AND Player Names should be hyperlinks under Results and open the player profile in the same window when clicked

title: User wants sending Request Bulletin to appropriately update player's Waiver info on their profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC or club user is logged in
AND TRD, OR or OPT waivers have been requested for one or more players 
AND the relevant Waiver Request Bulletin containing these players has been sent
custom_steps: WHEN user views the Waiver information on relevant player's profile
custom_expected:
THEN "In Effect" section should not be updated 
BUT "History" should be updated 
AND request Date, Claim Expiration Date, Requesting Club and Type columns should be populated
BUT remaining columns should be blank

title: User wants cancelling Waivers to appropriately update player's Waiver info on their profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC or Club user is logged in
AND TRD, OR, or OPT waivers have been requested for one or more players
AND those waivers have subsequently been cancelled
custom_steps: WHEN user views Waiver information section of relevant player's profile
custom_expected:
THEN "In Effect" section should be updated to say "No"
AND "Good Until" should be cleared if it is populated
AND "History" should be updated
AND Secured should be set to "No"
AND Awarded should be set to "No"
AND Withdrawal Date should be blank
AND Cancelled should be set to the date the Waiver was 
AND Cancellation Reason should be populated with the reason for cancellation (in case of BOC manually cancelling waivers this says “Cancelled by BOC”)

title: Waiver Permissions(Player Profile) - Club User
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a specific permission has been created to control the visibility of the "Waivers" collapsible section on the Transactions tab
AND this permission has been given to all those with Waivers permissions
AND Club user is logged in with this permission
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Waivers Section of Transactions Tab on a Pro Player Profile
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view the Request Date, Claim Expiration, Requesting Club, Type and Secured information
BUT only Club users that are part of the requesting Org with this permission should be able to view the Claimed By, Awarded, Withdrawal Date, Cancelled and Cancellation Reason information
AND other Clubs should see these columns as blank

title: Waiver Permissions(Player Profile) - BOC User
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a specific permission has been created to control the visibility of the "Waivers" collapsible section on the Transactions tab
AND this permission has been given to all those with Waivers permissions
AND BOC user is logged in with this permission
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Waivers Section of Transactions Tab on a Pro Player Profile
custom_expected: THEN user should be able to view the data for all columns

title: User wants to see a "ribbon" on top of Waivers screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC or Club user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Waivers screen
custom_expected:
THEN the "Ribbon" should be visible to both the BOC and Club users who have access to the Waivers screen.
AND the location and layout should follow the styling of the provided wireframe.
AND the ribbon should always show 5 Request Dates, in chronological order, with the most recent starting on the left
AND clicking on a date should automatically navigate the user to the appropriate "Request Date" in the Waivers screen, with the default expand/collapse behavior used for where the Request Date is in its lifecycle (Pending, Request Bulletin sent, Results Bulletin sent, etc.)
AND for bulletins displayed in the ribbon that are pending, only the Request Date and "Pending" should display
AND for bulletins displayed in the ribbon that have not yet had the results bulletin sent, the Request Date should be followed by "Claim Period Expires mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm ET" (time is always 1:00 PM ET)
AND for bulletins displayed in the ribbon that have already had the results bulletin sent, the Request Date should be followed by " Withdrawal Period Expires mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm ET" (time is always 1:30 PM ET)
AND the ribbon must display properly on screen resolutions down to 1024px wide

title: User wants "ribbon" to show most relevant Request Dates
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC or Club user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Waivers screen
custom_expected:
THEN the "Ribbon" should be visible to both the BOC and Club users
AND first spot in the Ribbon should always show the Pending bulletin whose Request Entry is next expiring. (EX: If today's date is 8/18 and it is noon, display the 8/18 bulletin. After 2:00 PM EST, display the next waiver date in the system)
AND remaining slots should be populated chronologically moving back from this first Request Date, only displaying dates for which a bulletin exists in the system

title: BOC user wants to be able to edit Withdrawal Period Expires Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Waivers Screen in edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN Withdrawal Period Expires Date should be editable (FOR BOC ONLY)
AND clicking "Save" should check that the field is populated (required field check) and should check that the entered date is after the entered Claim Expiration Date
AND if the field is not populated, a required field error message should display
AND If the entered date is after the entered Claim Expiration Date, error message “Withdrawal Expiration Date cannot be equal to or before the Claim Expiration Date.”
AND clicking "Back" should return user to the form

title: User wants to search for Waivers
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC or club user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Advanced Search
custom_expected:
THEN "Waivers" should be added as a Search Type
AND selecting "Waivers" should load Waivers advanced search
AND default filter selection should be "Date" 
AND once one or more filters have been added, the user should be able to run an advanced search and see results per the search requirements

title: Recalculate player's CBT impact on approval of UR
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a UR waiver request has been submitted for a player
AND an Unconditional Release transaction has been generated for the player
custom_steps: WHEN the Unconditional Release transaction is Approved
custom_expected: THEN CBT impact of the player should be recalculated

title: Rename Results to "Claims/Results"
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as Club or BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to Waivers Screen
AND user selects a request date for which results are available
custom_expected: THEN section previously named "Results" should now be named "Claims/Results"

title: User wants to view Waivers section of Email Utility using newly provided layout
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC or Club user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Waivers section of the Email Utility from System Admin on left nav
custom_expected: THEN layout of Waivers section should match provided wireframe (http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=email_utility)

title: User wants to be able to add and remove recipients from email utility bulletin for Waiver Bulletins
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with edit permissions for Email Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Waivers section of the existing email utility
custom_expected:
THEN layout should match provided wireframe (http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=email_utility) including "Recipients" section
AND user should be able to add and remove email recipients from the Waivers section

title: BOC user wants to send Waiver Request Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in and attempting to Send a Request Bulletin
AND "Send Emails" is set to "YES"
AND "Send Notification" is checked off under "Request Bulletin" for BOC and Club users
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Send Request Bulletin"
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate an email to all users listed in the Email Utility Result bulletin with "Send Notification" selected for the Org(s) that have Request Bulletin - Send Notification selected
AND All entered waiver requests should be included in this email
AND system should also generate an email to all users listed in the Email Utility Result Bulletin with "Send Notification, no trades" selected for the Org(s) that have Request Bulletin - Send Notification, No TRDs selected
BUT only OPT, OR and UR waiver requests should be included in that email
AND Subject of the emails should be "mm/dd/yyyy Wvr Req Bulletin" with the Request Date displayed
AND Top of email should display (with proper bulletin #and dates populated):
     -MLB - Waiver Request Bulletin
     -Bulletin #1003353 Mon 08/15/2016
     -Claim period expires Wed 08/17/2016
AND Format of each request should be:
     -Type - Requesting Org
     -Player Last, Player First Middle Initial. - POS - MLS: 0.000
     -Last TX: (as displayed on bulletin in system)
AND Bottom of email should contain:  "ALL WAIVER INFORMATION IS TO REMAIN STRICTLY CONFIDENTIAL. DO NOT FORWARD THIS INFORMATION. VIOLATIONS MAY RESULT IN FINES OR OTHER DISCIPLINE. End of Bulletin*"

title: BOC user wants to send Waiver Request Bulletin - Send Notif./Send Emails = NO
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in and attempting to Send a Request Bulletin
AND "Send Emails" is set to "NO"
OR "Send Notification" under "Request Bulletin" for BOC or Club user is unchecked
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Send Request Bulletin"
custom_expected: THEN no email should be sent

title: BOC user wants to send Waiver Result Bulletin to BOC users
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in and attempting to send a Waiver Result Bulletin
AND Send Emails" is set to "YES"
AND  "Send Notification" is checked off under "Result Bulletin" for BOC users
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Send Result Bulletin"
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate an email to all users listed in the Email Utility Result bulletin with "Send Notification" selected for BOC that have Result Bulletin - Send Notification selected. All non-cancelled Waiver Requests will be included
AND system should also generate an email to all users listed in the Email Utility Result Bulletin with "Send Notification, no trades" selected for the Org(s) that have Request Bulletin - Send Notification, No TRDs selected
BUT this email should be identical to the one generated for "Send Notification", except no TRD requests should be shown
AND Subject of the emails should be "mm/dd/yyyy Wvr Res Bulletin" with the Request Date displayed
AND Top of email should display (with proper bulletin #and dates populated):
-MLB - Waiver Result Bulletin
-BOC Version (All Clubs) 
AND Format of each result should be:
-Player Last, Player First M.I. - Type (TRD)
-{Waiver Result}
AND if player was not claimed, Waiver Result should match what is displayed on the Results section for BOC (ex: Secured through end of the Championship Season)
AND If player was claimed, then Claiming information is shown. Eligible Org has . Example:
-Claimed by: MIA 8/11/2016 12:58
-TB 8/11/2016 12:32
-LAA 8/11/2016 12:46
-TOR 8/11/2016 12:35
-HOU 8/10/2016 16:16
-NYY 8/11/2016 12:44
(Results of request bulletin 1003347 dated Tue 08/09/2016 which expired on Thu 08/11/2016)
AND Bottom of email should contain -
"ALL WAIVER INFORMATION IS TO REMAIN STRICTLY CONFIDENTIAL. DO NOT FORWARD THIS INFORMATION. VIOLATIONS MAY RESULT IN FINES OR OTHER DISCIPLINE. End of Bulletin *"

title: BOC user wants to send Waiver Result Bulletin to BOC users - Send Notif./Send Emails = NO
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in and attempting to send a Waiver Result Bulletin
AND Send Emails" is set to "NO"
OR "Send Notification" under "Result Bulletin" for BOC users is unchecked
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Send Result Bulletin"
custom_expected: THEN no email should be sent

title: BOC user wants resending notifications for Request Bulletin to also resend email notifications
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in and viewing the waivers screen
AND user has selected a Request Date for which the Request Bulletin has already been sent
AND user sees the "Resend Notification Emails" button on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Resend Notification Emails" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should open a pop-up where the user should be able to select the type of notification emails to resend, and the Org(s) it should be resent to
AND clicking "Resend" with "Request" selected should NOT store any changes made to the form or update the stored bulletin, but should generate a new set of notifications for the selected recipients, as well generate a new email for the selected recipients according to the same rules used in the original "Send Request Bulletin" story (https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/128626185)

title: BOC user wants resending notifications for Result Bulletin to also resend email notifications
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in and viewing the waivers screen
AND user has selected a Request Date for which the Request Bulletin has already been sent
AND the corresponding Results Bulletin for this request has also been sent 
AND user sees the "Resend Notification Emails" button on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Resend Notification Emails" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should open a pop-up where the user should be able to select the type of notification emails to resend, and the Org(s) it should be resent to
AND Clicking "Resend" with "Result" selected will NOT store any changes made to the form or update the stored bulletin, but will generate a new set of notifications for the selected recipients, as well generate a new email for the selected recipients according to the same rules used in the original "Send Result Bulletin" stories (https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/126758579, https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/128679367)
